instructions: Crumble sausage into frying pan. Add potatoes, pepper and onion. Cook slowly until sausage is browned. Beat eggs and combine with milk. Add to sausage mixture and cook, stirring occasionally to fluff eggs, until eggs have thickened. Refrigerate leftovers.
ingredients: 1/2 pound Bob Evans® Original Sausage Roll
1/2 (20 ounce) package Bob Evans® Home Fries Diced Potatoes
title: Down-Home Breakfast Special
